item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in New Haven.

This week's location is: Mory’s

Who gets you into exclusive places? The collective does! That’s right - this week we’re going to head over to Mory’s, a private membership-only Yale icon. It was originally opened in 1849 (as of 2005 it was named an official New Haven landmark), but it has just been newly renovated. The new Temple Bar in the back, where we’ll be, is supposed to be beautiful. Let’s check it out! They’re offering some great specials for us:

• $6 well Manhattans and Martinis
• $4 flirtini martini (raspberry liquor, pineapple juice, and champagne)
• $2 PBR draft beer
• $3 Mic ultra and New Castle bottled beer
• $4 house Merlot, Chardonnay, Cabernet

More info on Mory’s: http://en.wikipedia.o...'s

Official Mory’s Website: http://www.morysclub....

Hope to see you all there. Host is Devorah, contact number in RSVP.

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours. Ever.

***Bring a friend***
item.name: **Happy Hour at the exclusive Mory's!**
